title: The Breakdown on Twitter
body: "Smith today on how she would have used the Sovereignty Act - "STRAWS! WE COULD HAVE SAVED THE STRAWS! THINK OF THE ROOT BEER FLOATS!" Apparently we needed this Act so servers could dig out & recycle used plastic straws. That wasn't on our bingo card. #abpoli #ableg #cdnpoli"

Smith today on how she would have used the Sovereignty Act - “STRAWS! WE COULD HAVE SAVED THE STRAWS! THINK OF THE ROOT BEER FLOATS!”

Apparently we needed this Act so servers could dig out & recycle used plastic straws.

That wasn’t on our bingo card. 

#abpoli #ableg #cdnpoli
